body.p: I am exceedingly obliged for the information conveyed in your private letter of the 1st. inst.
Native affairs on the East coast are assuming a very serious aspect and it is necessary to be prepared at all points for any thing that may occur.

The month of August was all along spoken of by the Hauhaus the 18 & 28 of that month as the time for a general attack. I see your correspondent writes on the 24th. So that no doubt he was under the impression at the time that the August prophecies might be fulfilled.

Yesterday some of Karaitiana’s people threatened to pull down a hui or Hauhau flag of Paora Noinoi’s, you know what that would lead to. I have warned Karaitiana not to precipitate hostilities and I think matters will be quiet here for a time.
